name: OR_LOG_PNDS_IND
description: The OR_LOG_PNDS_IND table contains OR management system log PNDS indicator information.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log that the PNDS indicators refer to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the PNDS indicator in the log.

columns.name: PNDS_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the PNDS indicator.

columns.name: PNDS_INDICATOR_ID_ELEMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.

columns.name: PNDS_IND_ACHVD_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this indicator was achieved.

columns.name: PNDS_IND_NOTES
columns.description: Free text comments about the indicator.

columns.name: PNDS_IND_ADDED_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this indicator was added by a user.

columns.name: PNDS_IND_OUT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the PNDS outcome associated with this indicator.

columns.name: PNDS_IND_OUT_ID_ELEMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.
